about_the_game:
Based on Real Events

In 2015, an Argentine lawyer was found dead in his home after making a few powerful enemies. Some say that he committed suicide, and others say that he was silenced. The truth behind his death has been lost... or has it? 

Continue the investigation in After Death: a first-person horror game based on this mysterious death. Some say that our developers have gotten an insider's peek into the investigations that went on behind this incident... 

Investigate a Strange World

You are Prosecutor Bisman. After a sudden death, you wake up as a ghost in a police station where the Grim Reaper himself roams the corridors. Speak to the only living man in prison who can see you, help the other ghosts trapped there, and maybe someone will help you to get your memories back...

Key Features

  • Classic Horror Elements: The Grim Reaper is always lurking around the corner, watching and waiting... Can you avoid his grasp?

  • Meaningful Choices: Change the fate of different characters in the story with your decisions. Will you be their hope or their doom?

  • Complex Narrative: Build a complete picture of your own murder case by experiencing multiple endings, each revealing new information. Gather all the clues and find a way to finally rest in peace.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD FX-4300 or Intel i3-4130 or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support (AMD R9 285 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel i7-930 or newer)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with 6GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 6.0/6.1 support (i.e. AMD RX 580 8GB and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard

short_description: After Death is a police horror videogame based on real events, where the fate of Bisman is in your hands. Prosecutor Bisman is murdered, next to his body there is only his ghost, without memories, wanting to solve the mystery of his own death. Meanwhile, the Reaper is on the prowl...
